EmailTemplate.name: GSMLS Introduction - 2nd Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Following Up: MLS Introduction- GSMLS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Hope your week is going great! I wanted to follow up on the previous email. In order for GSMLS to grant IDX data feed approval on your site, GSMLS requires agents to request a data access agreement on the GSMLS platform.
To get started on the data access agreement please follow the step-by-step instructions linked here: GSMLS Instructions
Let me know if you have any questions. I'm here to help!
Best Regards,
